properties.name: penkatur.profiles.user.security.monthsPasswordExpiration
properties.description: Determines the number of months after which user passwords expire

properties.name: penkatur.security.jwt.cookieName
properties.description: Represents the name of the cookie where the JWT is stored

properties.name: penkatur.security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Attribute indicating the secret key used for JWT encryption and decryption

properties.name: penkatur.security.jwt.cookieExpiration
properties.description: Attribute indicating the expiration time for the JWT, specified in seconds
